overview: Aisha lives with her mother and sister Sarah. For the sake of his mother's healing. sometimes Aisha hid her sadness. One day her mother entrusts Sarah to Aisha to be taken to school. Before arriving at school, Aisha get news that her mother dies. Aisha tries to be strong. Another day Aisha finds a letter. This makes Aisha know who she really is.  Note: Produced in Palu by local crews and players.
title: Air Mata Aisyah
